alert.note: Alert for Chittenden; Franklin; Lamoille (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 12:02AM EDT until July 26 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LAMOILLE...NORTHEASTERN CHITTENDEN AND SOUTHERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 1202 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near North Fairfax, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Johnson Village, Waterville, Cambridge, Bakersfield, Cambridge Village, Johnson, Jeffersonville Village, Fairfax, Belvidere Center, Fletcher, Fairfield, Belvidere, St. Albans City, Georgia, Montgomery, Morristown, Westford, Milton, Enosburg, and St. Albans Town. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
